resources.string: A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
A shrimp\'s heart is in its head.
If you sneeze too hard, you may fracture a rib.
Almonds are a member of the peach family.
Most people fall asleep in seven minutes.
A dime has 118 ridges around the edge.
Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur.
An ostrich\'s eye is bigger than its brain.
A cat has 32 muscles in each ear.

Do you want to sharpen your knowledge or test your skills in various subjects? If so, then this application is just for you! There are lots of different subjects to choose from, each one containing various questions that will test your expertise in each field. Do you think you have what it takes? Then what are you waiting for? Go ahead and try a quiz for yourself!
Would you like an email with additional info and your score?
"If yes, please enter your email address in the text bellow."
